front.title: Usability of PIV smartcards for logical access

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This manuscript is being revised to correct an error in the original regarding the specific certificates on the PIV card. The corrections are in two paragraphs of Section 4.2.5 (?Certificates?). This version supersedes the version published in June 2012.

seriesInfo.name: NISTIR; NIST IR; NIST interagency report; NIST internal report
